metadata.title: CVE-2023-22845 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the TGAInput::decode_pixel()functionality of OpenImageIO Project OpenImageIO v2.4.7.1. A speciallycrafted targa file can lead to information disclosure. An attacker canprovide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openimageio package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
